website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for gymnasts wanting a high-quality hand grip without shelling out a lot of money.
pros: Leather provides excellent coverage to wrists as well as palms
Customers appreciate how easy the gloves come on and off when switching between workouts
cons: Many customers have difficulties finding the proper sizing

customer_reviews.title: Great for Crossfit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great wrist wraps for Crossfit. Flexible and durable and not slippery at all. I’ve had them for few months now and they work great especially for the price when compared to other brands that are 4x the price. Well worth it. Also the stitching is great so they don’t see signs of tearing after lots of pull-ups and toes to bars. A+++ from me. Also customer support were very responsive answering my question.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: First pair of hand grips
customer_reviews.text: While they work well-enough, I didn't have many expectations on my first pair of hand grips. After using them, I have a couple comments: -No L/R hand indicator -The hand length is good, but there's two velcro parts for wrapping around your wrists -- the first pair of flaps is kinda small. I have wide wrists and the two pieces barely velcro around them. The second, stretch velcro part that wraps over the first flaps is what holds these in place. Otherwise, they get the job done. They save my hands so that I don't have to wear gloves to avoid some callouses.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Connelly

customer_reviews.title: I use these for CrossFit!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for about a month now and I absolutely love not ripping my hands apart while doing pull ups or lifting heavy weights. The only problem I had was how much they stained my hands at first. When I first began to use them, I got so much dye on my hands and little black fuzzy things kept falling off of them which was annoying. Overall a great product though, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Laken Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good value but not the greatest for CrossFit. The finger holes are uncomfortable when doing pull-ups and the wrist wraps aren’t strong enough to support you without using the finger holes. Good durability so far, but I would buy a pair of grips with sturdier wrist wraps. Edit* AEOLOS contacted me and gave me a replacement pair with much better wrist wraps. That is fantastic customer service. I still stand by my review that these specific wraps aren’t good for CrossFit BUT .... AEOLOS sells another version of these with much better wrist support which is perfect for CrossFit 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 I will continue to buy this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: After only using these 5 times. One of them ripped. I would only use for pull ups. Not sure why this happened, they seemed thick at first but thinned out really quickly. I changed my rating from 1 to a 4 because of the customer service. They saw my review and immediately refunded my money. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Never been a big grip user but decided to purchase a set after almost ripping after a workout with a lot of toes to bar. I am very happy with these and the quality is as good as that of any other grips I have seen. My wife has a set of Bear Complex grips that she paid about 2.5 times the cost of the Aeolos and they are of not better quality, if as good. I would recommend these, especially for someone that only uses grips occasionally or is just becoming accustomed to grip use before dropping money on a set with a more popular name!
customer_reviews.author: jsb

customer_reviews.title: Reduced callus pain
customer_reviews.text: Pull ups, deadlifts, and barbell rows were incredibly painful before getting these. It was difficult to get the most out of those lift because my hands would be in agony before the muscles and my grip strength could benefit from the movement. These help. I can continue doing those lifts now without my calluses ruining it for me. I wrote an identical review for another similar product. I don't perform gymnastics. My hands are just jacked up and need protection to get the most out of my lifts.
customer_reviews.author: AA2010

customer_reviews.title: Love the protection of the hands and the attached wristband ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the protection of the hands and the attached wristband is great. My hands measure 4'' and bought a small and I could used a xs for a better fit in the hand and wrist
customer_reviews.author: Areerat S. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT Buy the Black Handguards
customer_reviews.text: The black handguards feel alright, but they leave absolutely AWFUL stains/streaks/markings on everything you touch and your hands. Here is a picture of the rings I train on and the black streaks left behind, as well as a picture of my hand after only one session of training (keep in mind this is after scrubbing my hands meticulously as well). The black handguards must have been colored in a cheap dye which is why they rub off so easily.
customer_reviews.author: csun

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair from AEOLOS and I will continue buying them... They fit great, provide excellent wrist support and provide enough grip for heavy barbell movements. I bought and tried the single layer pair this time (previous were double layer) and they just didn’t work for me (use to the double). I contacted Anna (the owner) and without any hesitation even though the return window had closed she sent me double layer pair immediately... I also did not have to go through the hassle of returning the single layer pair... Amazing customer service... I will definitely without doubt buy again...
customer_reviews.author: S. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: There are so many options out there for crossfit gloves, and these check all the boxes, while still coming in at a great price point. Finger slots are slightly tight, but I presume with use they will thicken a bit to my finger width with use. Don't let that sway you - these are the way to go. Hopefully the amazon algorithm will bring these lads to the top soon - look forward to workouts more, now that my hands aren't going to be shredded.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money,
customer_reviews.text: These grips seem very well made out of quality material. They feel solid and provide good grip and protection. I’ve been using them for CrossFit workouts for three weeks and they are very comfortable. For the money, these seem like a very good deal. The Velcro tabs used to connect the straps could be a bit bigger, but there is a much larger, elastic strap that wraps around the entire wrist to hold the whole grip in place and that strap is more than adequate. Good value, I’d buy these again if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Like and works well
customer_reviews.text: I've had the hand grips about 3 weeks, I like them but am still getting use to them, the reason for 4 stars. I"ve always worn gloves during my workouts and these just feel and fit a little different. I like that my hand doesn't get as sweaty, that I can flip it off my palms quickly when I need to and the wrist wrap support, which I've never had before either. Be sure to take note if you are ordering a single or double layer thickness. I have the single layer and wouldn't want the extra bulk of the double layer.
customer_reviews.author: vvl

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather, tears over time
customer_reviews.text: I have had these grips for close to a year now. I like the leather a lot, much more than other materials. I feel that the three-holes encourage rips in the middle of the palm, but protect the high palm/under finger region (so decide what you want more protected). Over time, the grips have started to tear on the sides, and the straps really dig in to my skin after a while but overall happy with the way they have performed. I will be switching to a two-hole grip in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Beuch

customer_reviews.title: Great hand grip guard
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. I've found though via my own personal preference I thought I would like the thicker wrist strap, but I think I would prefer a slightly slimmer one. It would make having these on for other movements in your workouts much easier. I also think I would not go for the double padding on the grips next time. Overall though they are doing what they were designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: These were much higher quality than I was expecting for $17. Soft, thick leather. Supportive and comfortable wrist supports with a double Velcro system. Just did my first hero wod with them with 105 butterfly pull-ups with a 20# vest and hands were great after. Even comes with a little carry bag to keep them nice.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smykowski

customer_reviews.title: If it didn't bleed the dye it would be an okay grip
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love nor did I dislike this grip. Only had it for about 1-2 weeks, used it 4-5 times. Felt comfortable during workouts, however at the end when I took them off, my wrists were stained light brown every single time. I don't know what dye was used and I don't want any chemical on my skin that I didn't intentionally put there - returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Black all over update...
customer_reviews.text: I like these for Xfit as they save my hands. My only complaint is that as soon as you sweat your hands and wrists turn BLACK. I’ve tried washing them but it seems like the dye is water soluble. It’s just keeps running black. UPDATE: The company sent me the brown pair and they are excellent with no color run. If you're a cross fitter get the brown pair! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Helps with grip strength
customer_reviews.text: No amount of chalk keeps your hands protected from blisters and the pain. These are great and keep your hands protected and helps with grip as well. No matter how much I work on grip strength I still can't grip well. These help with that as well. They did smell pretty badly right out of the package though but with a bit of airing out they did lose that strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Traci C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a year ago and they tore at exactly one year which is not surprising. I chose these grips because they fit over my wrist sweatbands during workouts. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: peter chango

customer_reviews.title: Best grips out there!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gymnastics grips and I absolutely LOVE them. NO MORE RIPS! I’ve actually recommended them for other friends in my gym and they’ve purchased them and are also amazed at the quality of the product for the prize. I had Bear complex carbon fiber grips before and these grip way better and more natural work for me. Would HIGHLY recommend them for Crossfit style WODS. Done big sets of T2B, C2B and BMU and no more rips or hurting hands. They do take one or two WODS to brake in only. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Zayra Vargas

customer_reviews.title: They work well. And stink.
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly for kettlebells. The gym I go to is all about CrossFit, so they don’t know what they’re doing with equipment purchases. They have textured grip kettlebells. I bought these to avoid leaving hand meat all over the handles. They work well. What makes them sturdy also makes them not very comfortable. They stink like dead animal, so I hang them on the outside of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo is a terrible drummer

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable Grips. Perfect for OL. Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made grips and very durable with the double layer. Perfect for Olympic Lifting. For gymnastics moves like ring or bar muscle ups where ring or bar feel in important to the athlete, the single layer is more suitable. This company has a best in class warranty and customer service. You can’t go wrong if you give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: For the price, a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really have a complaint with this product considering the price compared to products of similar nature. The one thing that you need to know is that the wrist wraps are kind of small compared to the hand size. The Velcro barely reaches. The grip itself (leather) is of high quality. I'm pleased. ***After reading my review, this company reached out to me and voluntarily send me a replacement item. The replacement item is awesome and I am completely satisfied. You honestly can't buy a product of this quality for this price anywhere else.***
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big fan of wearing things on my hands but I also rip my hands easily during intense work outs so these are a necessity! I still haven't gotten use to wearing them but they do help protect my hands and are strong, sturdy, and durable. If you are thinking of getting some do not hesitate these work great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Great for big guys
customer_reviews.text: Pull ups were ripping my palms apart, literally, as I am a heavy guy (230 lbs). These grips really helped and I haven't had a blister rip in a while. These are a little slick at first, but once they get soaked in chalk they work really well. The wrist bands are thick and heavy enough to provide support. So if going from picking up to overhead, there grips are great for your hands and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Kent H.

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY no more tearing!
customer_reviews.text: As far as functionality, these score a 100. In gloves I've worn in the past, you do enough pull-ups in a row and you're going to tear, regardless of wearing gloves. That's not going to happen with these. The leather is great quality! The measurements seemed a little off to me. I ordered a small after following the sizing guide and honestly, I could use an extra small. They bunch up at the palm some and the cuff for around the wrist lands in an awkward spot. If I had bought the smaller size, I'm pretty sure they would be getting a 5 Star from me.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best grips I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best grips I have ever used. Takes just a little bit to get used to them but worth it once you do. I have been using them for over a year, usually 3x a week or so for pullups, T2B, and MU's and they are still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing and uncomfortable. Customer support sent new pair that fit better.
customer_reviews.text: I used the sizing instructions and the hand grips are way too small. They are too small in both length and the wraps that go around the wrists. I've used the hand grips for 3 workouts so far thinking they just needed to be broken in, but they are just way too uncomfortable for me to use any longer. It was nice that they came in their own little carrier bag though and it seems like the leather is decent enough quality. Updated: Customer support was good, they sent me a new pair that fit well enough.
customer_reviews.author: James Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Single layer grips are better!
customer_reviews.text: I've had single layer Aeolos grips in the past and I love them. The last time I had to replace my grips due to wear and tear I decided to get the double layer grips to see if they would last longer. The single layer ones I think are pretty durable considering how much I use them, but figured it would be good to extend the lifetime of my gear. Anyway, these double layer grips are well made, great quality, and definitely durable. However, they are just too thick for me and affect my grip on the bar, so I'm going back to the single layer grips.
customer_reviews.author: miguelc

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing CrossFit for about a year now. I use these for bar work. I have super sensitive hands - and these were just too thin and not the best quality in my opinion. They stay on securely at the wrist which is important, but I could still feel the burn through the palms. They are nice material, but didn't work for me. Good starting grips for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: fmg87975

customer_reviews.title: I get excellent grip on the pull-up bar
customer_reviews.text: The grips seem very well made, although I've only used them a couple of times so far. I get excellent grip on the pull-up bar, and the extra wrist support was nice during push-presses. Also, customer service was excellent. The size I ordered were a little big, so I went a size smaller. They refunded my original purchase and sent me the new one's within 2 days, plus I got to keep the other one's and didn't have to mess with sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great value, comfort & durability for daily CrossFit use!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several pairs of gymnast grips over the years and these are definitely the best value. They're comfortable and durable. I use them for CrossFit almost daily and I love 'em! I'll definitely get my next pair from these guys. One thing, I wish the leather and Velcro portion of the wrist wrap was a bit longer to fit if you have your wrist wraps or anything on under them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Y

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after a few times
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use these grips three times for pull-ups and they ripped. The grip itself is a tough leather, but the wrist wrap is not as sturdy which is precisely why it breaks in this location. If it was a sturdier wrist wrap, this would be a great product and I would give it a 5 star rating. *Update: The customer service for this product is excellent and sent me a brand new product. I updated this review to a three star-review.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Parks

customer_reviews.title: New at CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: I am brand new at CrossFit (like 4 months new) & tore my hands up pretty good during one of the open workouts where I attempted toes to bars. I decided to give these at try because of the reviews, veteran led(USMC Vet here) and price; I'm not sure how they're supposed to fit but the people at my box are great and they told me I should be good. I tried them out for several reps of T2B and WHAT A FREAKING DIFFERENCE!!!!!!!!!!!! I'll update on the durability in a few months. And I'll see if they are too big once I use them for a full WOD. Thank you!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: I made an order yesterday via Amazon and as promised, the package arrived today (maybe because I am a PRIME member) free delivery. Initially, I thought the materials used were not that good, but I am telling you they look great in person! I got the brown with the black band. I am excited to try it out later in the gym. By the way, it came with a VIP card that says 20% off on your next purchase of any AEOLOS products. Here's an actual photo that I took from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this product received high review It might have been reviewed by 10 year old girls This is typical chines product and chines sizing method Sizes are simply not tru fit for grown man I will be returning this item
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible, the very first day I used them I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible, the very first day I used them I ripped open my previously unscathed hand right on the palm. The next workout I tried wrapping them around the pull-up bar instead of using the finger holes and found it more difficult to grip than bar than if I was barehanded. They neither protected my hands nor improved my grip, and I will be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Review4You

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for crossfit/gymnastics!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! I have used a cheap straps and also paid twice as much for the name brand stuff. These are better than the name brand, 1/3 of the price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Argroves

customer_reviews.title: comfy, durable, economical
customer_reviews.text: I do crossfit where there is allot of bar pull ups and barbell work. I used to mess with taping to keep my hands from ripping doing bar pullups, etc. Its so much easier to put on the hand grips. It saves my hands from blisters, calluses and or tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Lumley

customer_reviews.title: Nice but fingers are too big for me
customer_reviews.text: The material is quite nice and feels like it would be AWESOME once broken in! However, the finger holes are so wide that it makes my grip super uncomfortable. Luckily, my boyfriend and I just swapped and now we're both happy!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband because he said he wanted something to help his grip when doing pull ups. He’s loved this product and the durability of the leather. He says it’s made a huge difference in his gripping ability.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Bell

customer_reviews.title: Need to be broken in but very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had grips in the past, these are considerably thicker at the beginning but as I use them, they break in easily. The sizing is very important, I have small hands and they fit very well. I noticed less bunching under my hand when on the bar over other brands I have used. the finger holes can be a little tight at first but loosen as they break in. I also like the wrist wrap portion, so I do not have to wear my wrist wraps on top of my grips, it is all built in.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: worked better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Did my first workout what these, 100 pull ups sets of 10, not one blister.. , worked better than I expected, the three hole version is a lot better than the two other companies put out. The fit and finish is excellent would defiantly recommend ... These grips will last for years...I think they will be even better once they have broken in..Great product.Glad I ordered 2 sets
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for CrossFit!
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use these grips for gymnastic movements during CrossFit workouts. It's been over a couple of months now and these grips hold pretty well after a few thousand of rig exercises. I occasionally use them for barbell movements as well and they perform pretty nice. All in all, this is a solid product at an affordable price. I also want to give a shout out to the support team of this brand, they quickly addressed a small issue that I had after the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Marks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grip protectors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help save my hands/grip, as I work on achieving a strict pull-up. So far they have done everything that I have asked them to. The only mild criticism that I have is that it would be useful to have the hands labeled (L, R). However, they really are not hand specific, so it’s not that big of an issue. However I did have to play around to find out which one works better on each hand.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pull ups, Ring work and Lifting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for cross fit because doing pull ups were eating into my hands causing blisters. These have help increase my grip strength significantly and time on the bar. I would recommend. I only wish they would come with instruction on how to wash them. They are leather and I do not want to put them into the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Oodles-of-noodles

customer_reviews.title: The 2 layers straps are amazing for any type of bar work.
customer_reviews.text: The 2 layers are quality! They're thick and I really like how the wrist straps can double as support straps. The only thing that concerns me is how long the stitching that connects the straps to the leather will last. It doesn't seem to be too reinforced, but if it comes off it's an easy fix, just inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonzo J.

customer_reviews.title: Used these a few times so far and really like them! They fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used these a few times so far and really like them! They fit perfect, have good coverage, and I still have good grip on the bar with them. We even ordered a second pair for my husband. I have the 2 layer one and ordered the 1 layer for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sinitiere

customer_reviews.title: Best glove for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great! I just started learning kipping pull-ups and my hands were getting torn to shreds. I started out using tape, which helped but decided to make the jump to something sturdier. I’ve only used them once but so far so good! The grip is great and the stiffness of the leather has already broken in. I have also done ball slams and burpees with these on and I don’t even notice them when transitioning back to pull-ups. Def great value for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A little too thick for me
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable and easy to use. I do wish they were a little but thinner. Because of the thickness, it makes my grip fade faster (for instance, when I'm doing a lot of toes-to-bar reps and sets).
customer_reviews.author: Kt W.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell from these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Initial quality of these gloves are fine and they fit fine but the chemical smell from how they treated the leather is unbearable. I would have returned them but I already used them in the gym. Tried soaking in vinegar, covering with baking soda over night. NOTHING GETS THE SMELL OUT! I do not recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I got a size M and it’s slightly big in the palm. My palms are exactly 4 inches. I’m a slender guy too, and the wrist straps are a little big but it’s not a big deal. I emailed the company to exchange for a small and someone named Anna got back to me very quickly. They said they would send me a replacement within the week and I didn’t even have to send my old pair back! Very satisfied and, although the grips I ordered were too big for me, the quality of the product is very good and, again, great customer service. Thanks Anna!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wei

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and performance of these. They help me stay on the bar and are very grippy. No complaints here especially when I was almost going to pay $50 for Victory or Bear Komplex grips! Glad I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed utilizing these grips for Crossfit but after three uses, the leather ripped by the wrist strap. I have a cheaper pair of grips that I have had for three years and still going strong. I do not recommend these grips.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great for pull-ups and weight lifting
customer_reviews.text: My son likes to do pull-ups in all different hand positions. He was thrilled with these hand grips which protect his hands from getting rubbed raw and forming blisters. He says they also helped to stabilize his wrists! He is excited to use them also for lifting weights. A super great benefit is that he can transition from one exercise to another comfortably and easily!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy H

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: These worked for about a month and then tore while doing kipping pull ups. Definitely advise using a name brand with thicker more durable leather straps. Update: company fully refunded me after this review so that was nice
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cangelosi

customer_reviews.title: I like the wrist support but the sizing was off
customer_reviews.text: I like the wrist support but the sizing was off. My hand still slides around during t2b and pull ups. Causes blisters if you have to do a lot in a row. I really wish they came in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of the size you will need
customer_reviews.text: I used these grips to do weight lifting for my back. My goal was to reduce the amount of grip pressure needed for pulling type exercises and these trips worked perfect. They are very comfortable and easy to adjust for fit. I have used them several times and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: liz stearns

customer_reviews.title: Ripped apart after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: These were great for the price and comfortable until the grip ripped apart from the wrist strap in the middle of a toes-to-bar workout... I guess that should be expected for about $20.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Bad design on the wrist straps
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the way the wrist-straps were designed. I'd rather have 1 side of the leather overlap a lot on the other side, with a loop back to the velcro, rather than the sides being almost equal in length. It was hard to get them tight enough. I also don't like the elasticity in the velcro straps. I've never had grips that were stretchy and I didn't like this fit at all. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Nice item and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice item and great customer service. You can trust they will take care of you and that's a HUGE plus. The item had a minor issue which was resolved very quickly. The item is well designed and quality. Nice accurate stitching etc. Saved my hands from blisters and getting beat up on muscle ups.
customer_reviews.author: L36A13T

customer_reviews.title: Leather Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these gloves twice so far and I really like them. They don't hurt my wrists and protect me palms. The only negative I have is that they are super soft on the bar even with chalk. I am assuming this is because they are so new and am looking forward to them getting broken in as I feel the grip will increase. I haven't had the gloves long enough to rate the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: 1st pair great. 2nd pair garbage
customer_reviews.text: I somehow forgot my grips in a gym up north and ordered another pair. The first pair were great. They broke in really fast and were very comfortable. The 2nd pair were the complete opposite. Ive had them a few months and for some reason are still really stiff and usually force me to take them off mid workout as they are making my grip worse. Not sure what went wrong
customer_reviews.author: adam bentley

customer_reviews.title: They're OK but color will bleed! (Brown version at least)
customer_reviews.text: The color on the gloves bleeds onto you hands extensively. They smell funny. And they shed a little. They're also not the most comfortable on the hands (they're loose around the fingers and pinch the skin).
customer_reviews.author: Jonas B.

customer_reviews.title: (Use the sizing chart and you will not be disappointed. ) I ordered these alongside another set in ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t gotten to test them out, yet, however when I pulled them out of the package and tried them on, they fit perfectly. (Use the sizing chart and you will not be disappointed.) I ordered these alongside another set in the same price range and so far am more pleased with these, mostly based on the thickness of the hand guard. (Not too thick, not too thin. The others are really thick.) Will update as I get to try them out later on today!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Sacrifice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I have never used these type of gloves before but they were recommended by a fellow lifter. First things first.Being that I have large hands the largest size is still too small. So with that being said I still tried to use them to do pull ups. I still ended up getting blisters because the material is simply too thin. So I ended up only using them once and putting them back in the bag. I suggest using different gloves all together or paying the price for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for several months. Do strictly pullups with it: 170 a workout two workouts a week. Still holding strong. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked these trips a good bit until today. Bought them back in August of this year. Very comfortable to wear and grip is good but the strength of the fabric is not as strong as I was expecting. The one I normally wear on my right hand ripped right next to the seam where the wrist wrap attaches to the palm grip. Really hope that this one just had a defect in it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lane

customer_reviews.title: Super nice leather CrossFit or gymnastics hands grips!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice leather CrossFit or gymnastics hands grips! Fit, feel and grip great! Very well made and durable! Highly recommend, great price at under $17! Make a great gift too :)
customer_reviews.author: krystle stolleis

customer_reviews.title: They work great 👌🏼 I have no complaints
customer_reviews.text: New to crossfit (5ish months).. and finally started getting the hang up kipping pull ups. So, my hands got all tore the f up when I did get the hang of it. Never wanted to experience that again, and so I looked for some relatively cheap grips/gloves and found these. They work great 👌🏼 I have no complaints. Are there better ones? Maybe. But these work fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have seen many folks at the gym with gloves not made as well as these and they paid twice the amount.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I previously gave this product a bad review because one of the grips i received was defective. However, the seller contacted me and sent a new pair of grips. The new pair have been working well for crossfit and are a good value for the price, although they do stain my hands black. The seller followed up multiple times to ensure I was satisfied with the product. I am very pleased with their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: Stain Hands  UpDATE
customer_reviews.text: overall they fit well , are easy to put on , comfortable ..BUT they weep black dye so bad its CRAZY . Each time I have worn them I can't get the dye off my hands. company contacted me and offered to send a non dyed pair . They have worked very well . Ihave had no issues and no STAINING of my hands . Will buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Dawnna Brittain

customer_reviews.title: These are great grips. Very durable and stay surprisingly clean after ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great grips. Very durable and stay surprisingly clean after a lot of sweat/chalk. They are a bit bulky compared to others I've used but overall excellent in design.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Great grips, but the dye needs work
customer_reviews.text: I really like these grips, but they dyed my hands and wrists orange the first 5-10 times I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and very good quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter found this hand grips, this is her first year doing gymnastics. We did not know what to expect. They arrived very fast, and we were impressed with all the shipping protection they had. But, besides that, they fit perfectly , and she is very happy. The material feels really good and are good quality. We are very happy with the selection we made!!!
customer_reviews.author: dinosaurio

customer_reviews.title: I don’t normally give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: By far, the longest lasting gloves I have brought. Great fit and tons of wrist support. The quality of these gloves are wonderful. I haven’t seen tearing or much wear. (In the gym 4-5 times a week and lifting weights on those days). But what puts this brand over the top is customer services. Quick response, and an actual person you can talk to. I don’t normally give 5 stars but when I do...... .......it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price.  (check review)
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these grips are really good for the price. I use them 2-3 times a week per WOD. However, the only thing that I do not like about these gloves are that they will turn your wrist black (at least mine did), and it takes a few washes to get the discoloration off your wrists. Other than that, I use them a lot and I like them. They hold up very well and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Todd G.

customer_reviews.title: They look nice, very cheaply made. Returning them
customer_reviews.text: I got these in the mail. I was so excited to try these since I hate those bulky gloves for weight, man was I disappointed. These are poorly made. Black color was coming off as I was looking at them. They definitely look nice but I don’t think they will last.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shah

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: used for kipping pull ups and toes to bar on a constant basis. started with a size large because that is the size i used for the wodies brand ended up having to get a medium. these have excellent grip so you don't have to take them off when transitioning between kipping movements to cleans and snatches. extremely durable, these can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Workout Grips
customer_reviews.text: Grips are a little to thick for my liking. Wrist strap barely fit even though I got the large.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for durability.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these grips for about 3 months. I use them sporadically during the week to improve my hanging time on the bar in preparation for my first strict pull up. I went to pull them out the other day and this is what I found. I couldn’t believe it! I think the grips were wet from sweat and then they dried and just broke. But I didn’t expect them to break through double layers of leather.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle r Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, low price
customer_reviews.text: These are legit. For reference. My hand measurement is 4.5 inches from the base of my ring finger to the intersection of my hand and wrist. My wrist circumference is about 7 inches. If my wrist was much bigger I’d have to stretch the wraps pretty tight to make them fit. I ordered the large. They work great for kettlebell snatches and I’m glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more hand rips!
customer_reviews.text: I like these grips ! This is my second pair. They are great on the bar for a toes to bar or my butterfly pull-ups!!!
customer_reviews.author: kate pacana

customer_reviews.title: Received a used product!!
customer_reviews.text: Received a used item. What kind of horrible business tries to scoff off used as new! Zero stars! Black marks on finger and rubbed/scuffed marks.
customer_reviews.author: Trojansky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great and craftsmanship seems of great quality! Leather is already soft, a bit slick on the bar but I’m sure after some more uses they will break in just fine! Very pleased and at a 1/3 of the price of the more expensive brands of Crossfit grips! A+
customer_reviews.author: Davin J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy, good quality, had to return due to the sizes being a little bigger than shown.
customer_reviews.author: Zetta

customer_reviews.title: A must for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: I love Crossfit but not the blisters. I wore these on a pull-up day and was able to complete more unbroken reps because my hands did not hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price, I was looking for a pair of these that doesn’t cost as much as other brands, comments here made me buy them and wasn’t dissapointed, great product and now I used them every time not just for pull ups, but every time I use my barbell
customer_reviews.author: juan jose

customer_reviews.title: Hand Grips for salmon ladder
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job. Very thick material, yet soft and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: CANDICE OSBORNE

customer_reviews.title: Tear after 4 times use
customer_reviews.text: Reaching out because I really like this product. Size guide worked well and I feel like I am glued to the bar for pull ups and T2B. My only issue is that after 4 times of use the seam is beginning to tear where the grips meet the wrist wrap. Bummed because I really like the leather but not sure how they are going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Robson

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: these are pretty bad. stiff and the "leather" color comes off on your clothing!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for pullups
customer_reviews.text: Too thick, can't use for pullups. Only use for weights.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I truly love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! Once they get broken in they are the best for any workout. I use them to lift, practice calystenics and yoga, I love them for yoga... they completely keep me from slipping and the wrist support is perfect. I have taken my strength and workouts to a whole different level just because of these. I wish I would have bought these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Those grips are made of real leather And they seem very durable. However I had to return them because my wrists are too thin and even wrapping it around, it would not enable to fit it well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcele

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good wrist support and the 2 layer is very nice. I was worried about the quality when buying but after using the product the quality is very good. Will buy again from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hruska

customer_reviews.title: Great hand protection
customer_reviews.text: These save my hands so much!! Love lifting with these!
customer_reviews.author: Sillychick

customer_reviews.title: The correct size for your hand
customer_reviews.text: The gloves feel great. Soft not stiff like others I’ve had in the past. My second pair was still a bit smaller than they should have been. But Aelos made it right by offering me another pair in the correct size free of charge!
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL M FARRIS

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I am thinking to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: nicky

product_meta.title: AEOLOS Leather Gymnastics Hand Grips-Great for Gymnastics,Pull up,Weight Lifting,Kettlebells and Cross Training
feature_bullets: PREMIUM LEATHER HAND GRIPS-We use two layers high quality leather that is not only durable deodorant but also soft and form fitting.It provide wrist support and stability, and protect you against injury callus and tears.

SAFE WRIST SUPPORT: More than just perfectly covering your palms, these hand grips safely encircle your wrists and can be conveniently adjusted according to your comfort level. Ergonomically designed to minimize pressure, reduce wrist strain and remain steady throughout your WOD or exercise routine, these grips are a powerful shield against a host of long-term wrist and joint conditions.

PALM PROTECTOR HAND GUARD: A perfect fit gymnastics grip to cover your palms! Our AEOLOS leather hand grips provide full palm protection against abrasions, scars, hand tears, calluses and blisters. So you don't have to worry about slips and reduced friction while gripping exercise equipment or doing chin ups, pull ups and WODs
FREE CARRYING BAG:So you can carry your grips in your bag without them getting sweaty, dirty, or without getting your other gym items covered in chalk from the grips.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If for any reason you're not 100% satisfied, we will REFUND your payment or send you a new one... no questions asked!
